sentence.Network_en: Finches start to molt at around twelve weeks of age.
sentence.Network_cn: 燕雀大约在12个星期大小的时候开始换羽毛。

sentence.Network_en: Molt - inhibiting hormone ( MIH ) is a member of CHH ( crustacean hyperglycemic hormone ) family.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜕皮抑制激素 ( molt -inhibitinghormone, MIH ) 属甲壳动物高血糖激素 ( crustaceanhyperglycemichormone,CHH ) 家族.

sentence.Network_en: This veterinary product is very effective in preventing animal molt.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种兽药对于防治兽类掉毛很有效.

auth_sentence.content: Crabs are most vulnerable to attack when they molt.

auth_sentence.content: Their exoskeletons come in two parts, not three, and they periodically molt those protective shells for new ones.

sentences.en: A mile more of rusty pine needles brilliant with gaudy fungus and molted feathers.
sentences.cn: 接下来的一里路，地上铺着锈朽的松针，点缀着艳丽的菇子和鸟类换掉的羽毛。
